body.name: Itari Thermal Printer, Portable Printer Wireless for Travel - M832 Bluetooth Printer Support 2''/3''/4''/A4/8.5''x 11'' Paper, Inkless Small Printer Compatible with Android and iOS Phone & Laptop
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 23 hrs 13 mins
features: Compact & Wireless - Weighing only 1.5lb, the Itari portable Thermal Printer is lightweight and compact. It easily fits into a laptop bag or briefcase, making it ideal for travel, office, home, car, truck, school, and more. Whether you need to print contracts, receipts, photos, journals, greeting cards, or shipping labels, this mobile printer has got you covered. It's perfect for students, teachers, business travelers, and more.

Print in 5 Different Sizes - The Itari M832 portable printers wireless for travel offers a wide range of printing sizes, allowing you to print on thermal paper of various widths, including 8.5'' x 11'' US letter/A4/4"/3"/2". Say goodbye to the hassle of carrying different types of printing paper on the go, as this bluetooth printer supports both thermal paper and thermal roll paper.

Effortless Setup - Setting up the Itari M832 wireless portable printer is a breeze. With its Bluetooth connectivity, you can easily connect it to your iOS or Android phone by installing the "Phomemo" app. Simply choose the right paper type, and you're ready to print your documents or pictures. Additionally, you can also connect the thermal printer to your Mac,Windows, Linux laptop using USB cables.

Ink-Free Portable Printer - The Itari M832 travel printer uses advanced thermal print tech, so no need for messy ink or toner. Forget about ink jams and constant cleaning hassles. With this compact printer, just swap out the thermal paper for easy printing at a low cost of only $0.14 per sheet – it is budget-friendly and better for the environment.

Quality Printing and Long-lasting Battery - The M832 wireless printer smoothly prints at high resolution (up to 300DPI), giving you clear text and sharp graphics. Thanks to its Bluetooth connectivity and a large 2600mAh battery capacity, you can print anytime and anywhere without the hassle of messy power cords.
Note – This small printer only works with thermal paper (not the regular kind) and does prints solely in black and white.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to use on your phone 1.) Download the “Phomemo” from your app store. 2). Enable Bluetooth on your phone > return to the Phomemo app & click to add device. 3.) Selected the M832 (for this model)- wait for it to pair. 4.) Upload the file in the "Phomemo" App to Print

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATED REVIEW - Read to see what happened.
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: Itari reached out to me after my original review to assist with the issues, and after a quick email exchange, we both decided to try a new printer. They shipped it out very quickly and I received it this morning.They didn't have the purple printer in stock so they gave me the option of replacing it with another color (I chose white, and I really appreciate them asking instead of just sending what they wanted). I unpacked the printer and used the same drivers for the laptop that I did for the original purple printer.It works perfectly tethered by USB. Multiple page prints wait for the next cut sheet page to be inserted and the print quality to me seems just a bit better than the original printer. I also loaded their application to my phone and tried all the options by Android/Bluetooth and it worked just as well.It is rare these days to get amazing customer service, and Itari really does deserve all the four and five-star reviews...they are amazing and even though it seems like I got a dud on the first try, they worked with me and I am very pleased with the end result. I highly recommend Itari and their thermal printer.*******************I have to reinstall the drivers almost every time I turn this on/plug it into my laptop. I wanted this to work with USB (which it says it does) but 8 times out of ten uses, I have to uninstall the drivers, stop what I'm working on to restart my laptop, and then reinstall the USB drivers and sometimes I have to do this multiple times to get it to work. So much for easy.Yes, it's very portable (so is a brick). When it works the print quality is ok for what I need (basic documents or pdf printing. I've used the roll of paper included with the printer and purchased a 100-pack of 8.5x11 sheets as single feed. The USB drivers do not let you control variations like cut sheets vs continuous. So when you print from USB using cut sheets, you are basically sending the document one page at a time to the printer or you will get errors.I don't need this to hook to my phone by wifi/Bluetooth, I want this to hook to my laptop by USB for basic, quick print jobs (which the description says it does)...but it's incredibly unreliable. I thought this would be a time/ink/money saver...but it's just not worth the frustration. It doesn't even give you an install path or directory for the driver set to manually add the drivers. I can't recommend this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ## Ditch the Ink, Grab the Go: My Itari M832 Portable Printer Adventure
reviews.reviewText: Let's face it, traditional printers are bulky, messy, and chained to their power cords. But what if you could **ditch the ink cartridges and print on the go**, with a printer that fits in your backpack and connects to your phone like magic? That's exactly what the **Itari M832 Portable Printer** promised, and I was eager to put it to the test.**First Impressions:**Out of the box, the M832 surprised me with its **compact size and lightweight design**. Seriously, it felt like I was holding a fancy tech gadget, not a printer! The **sleek white finish** and **minimal buttons** gave it a modern, user-friendly vibe.**Features that Traveled Well:**This little printer wasn't just small; it was packed with features that made me want to pack my bags and print the world:* **Wireless Printing:** Connect via Bluetooth to your phone, laptop, or even car (with an adapter) for effortless printing from anywhere. No more hunting for cables!* **Multiple Paper Sizes:** Print on regular letter/A4 paper, or smaller rolls for labels, receipts, or even stickers. This versatility covered all my on-the-go printing needs.* **300dpi Resolution:** The prints were surprisingly crisp and clear, perfect for documents, photos, or even QR codes. I was impressed with the quality, especially for such a portable printer.* **Rechargeable Battery:** No need for endless batteries! The built-in battery lasted for a decent amount of prints, and recharges quickly via USB.* **Easy-to-Use App:** The Phomemo app is intuitive and user-friendly, making printing from your phone a breeze. You can even edit photos, add filters, and customize your prints before sending them to the printer.**Printing Around the Globe:**I took the M832 on my weekend out-of-town trip and was amazed at its usefulness. I printed invoices, letters and receipts directly from my phone app. The battery held up surprisingly well, and the prints were clear and legible even in outdoor lighting. Back at home, I used it to print labels for organizing my pantry, and even surprised my friend with a custom sticker using a photo from our trip.**The Verdict:**If you're looking for a **compact, versatile, and user-friendly printer for travel, home office, or even occasional car printing**, the Itari M832 is a great choice. It's affordable, easy to use, and delivers surprisingly good quality prints. While the paper rolls can be a bit pricey, the convenience and portability make it a worthwhile investment.**The Final Note:**The Itari M832 won't replace your full-sized printer, but it's a fantastic option for on-the-go printing needs. It's small, powerful, and packed with features that make printing fun and convenient. So ditch the bulky cables and embrace the freedom of portable printing with the Itari M832!**Bonus Tip:**Get creative with the different paper sizes! Print mini to-do lists, custom labels for gifts, or even decorate your notebook with tiny printed photos. The possibilities are endless!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Neat portable printer
reviews.reviewText: I had some issues getting this to work on Windows. The key points are that the printer must be connected to the computer via the USB cable and switched on before installing the driver. If the printer is not visible during installation, the printer shows up with a message stating that the driver is not available. Once I resolved that issue (with a reboot in between), the printer is working flawlessly, with the USB connection (no Bluetooth for the PC).It has truly been designed for portability - lightweight, sleek, no leaking ink. If you are printing out something small and wish to save paper change the size - this won't affect the width of course (no matter which page size you select), but at least it can reduce the length of the tear-off page. Also, since there is no ink, you can print at the maximum DPI.I was a little put out that I had to download an app on my phone; I do not like downloading odd apps for every little device, so I use an old phone connected to its own WiFi for modern gadgets which all seem to require their own app. In many cases, the app is used to connect the device to the Wifi and then one does not really need the app, except to make configuration changes. However, I could not do that in this case, as the app has to be on the phone from which I want to print, and that is my normal phone. And, yes, it does print from my phone via Bluetooth.All in all, a nifty device that is easy to use.Review for: Itari Portable Printers Wireless for Travel - Support 8.5'' x 11'' US Letter & A4 Paper, Bluetooth Thermal Printer Compatible with iOS, Android Phone & Laptop, Inkless Mobile Printer, 300Dpi

reviews.reviewTitle: Phenomenal ✨️ perfect little portable gadget to have on hand
reviews.reviewText: This is quick, precise and efficient. Portable and reliable! Obviously you're not going to print super high quality photos, etc but fast and efficient documents, labels or even coloring sheets. Keep in mind its thermal printing paper. It does come with 1 roll (roughly 25 prints) but honestly it's compact and worth it for quick printing jobs.It's worth it

179,99 €Une imprimante thermique au format A4, qui permet d'imprimer des documents en noir et blanc directement depuis son smartphone. L'appareil fonctionne sur batterie et nécessite un papier spécial, livré en rouleau. Ce papier marque lorsqu'il est chauffé, ainsi l'imprimante ne nécessite pas d'encre.L'application est assez intuitive et donc facile d'utilisation.Au début j'ai eu du mal a synchroniser l'imprimante car j'avais déjà une autre petite imprimante de ce genre mais format étiquettes, qui semblait fonctionner avec la même application, mais en réalité, il y a plusieurs applications proposées par la marque, et les icones sont assez similaires. Attention donc de bien télécharger la bonne application.

📍PREMESSA:📌 premetto che è la prima volta che ordino ed utilizzo prodotti del genere. Grazie ad Amazon Vine ho potuto provare questo in particolare.📦 CONTENUTO E CONSIDERAZIONI:📌 Stampante Termica Portatile davvero comoda e funzionale. La cosa più bella di questa stampante è la possibilità di utilizzare rotoli di carta di diverse dimensioni e alimentarvi un singolo foglio. Ovviamente non è adatta per stampe di documenti e/o foto di altissima qualità. Ma documenti, etichette o persino fogli da colorare in modo rapido ed efficiente. È da tenere presente che la carta è carta per stampa termica. Viene fornita con 1 rotolo (circa 25 stampe). La cosa fondamentale è che i documenti Word sono stampati in modo chiaro e preciso, che è ciò per cui utilizzo principalmente questa stampante. L'app è simile ad altre app per stampanti termiche mobili in cui è possibile selezionare il formato della carta, la qualità dell'inchiostro” (bassa, media o pesante per le stampe più scure) e altre impostazioni, è molto intuitiva e facile da usare. Viene fornito anche con una custodia da trasporto con coulisse per tenere tutto in un unico posto✅ PRO:📌 Stampa senza inchiostro;📌 Precisa per documenti Word e PDF.📌 Installazione rotolo di carta di diverse dimensioni;📌 Portatile;❌ CONTRO:📌 prezzo (€ 179,99 nel momento in cui sto recendo);📍 CONCLUSIONI:📌 tutto sommato, nonostante il prezzo, lo consiglio per chi come me, ha necessità di stampare documenti quando si è in giro e non si ha la possibilità di tornare in ufficio ecc…🏁 4/5 stelle ⭐⭐⭐⭐️⚠️ Aggiornerò questa e le mie altre recensioni, nel caso in cui si presentino problemi o se ci dovessero essere novità.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was my first time using a thermal printer and I didn't know what to expect really. Included in the box is a few small rolls of thermal paper, portable strap, a user manual, and a charging cable. The battery is 1200mah I believe and therefore it doesn't need to always be plugged in which is great for portable charging.In order to print, you need to download the app (available on iOS and Android) and the printing is done via Bluetooth. It's pretty simple to set up and takes a few minutes at most. Just in case it wasn't clear, all printing is in black and white, so it's perfect for documents mainly.Overall, it's well made, easy to set up and the portability is fantastic.
